text:
Raskolnikov felt mixed up and wished he could have shared more. “I really messed that up,” he admitted. 

Razumihin shot back, “You need to be more careful.” 

They said this as they were leaving. Porfiry Petrovitch saw them out with way too much politeness. 

Once outside, the mood was dark. They walked in silence for a bit. Raskolnikov took a deep breath, trying to shake off the tension.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov and Razumihin leave a conversation with a sense of gloom and silence.
